en.title: About
en.content: Web developer and designer currently based in Winnipeg, Canada. I enjoy designing and coding and I am passionate about Front-End development.

items.title: Investors Group
items.description: Assisting with data quality investigation, data quality assurance, and transitioning legacy database reporting into the enterprise data environment.

items.title: Freelancing
items.description: Involved in multiple Front-End projects using different tools and technologies.

items.title: phpBB Support Team
items.description: I was part of the support team of an open source forum software, phpBB. My role was helping the community with template related problems as well as designing and coding production ready templates.
